content: Chess players with prodigious memories perform incredible feats, such as playing blindly, at the same time, a large number of matches.
translations: ita:I giocatori di scacchi con memorie prodigiose compiono imprese incredibili, come giocare alla cieca, allo stesso tempo,
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
